live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.

48621.summary: Some customers in the Routley, Southwest Gordon Estate and Langley Meadows area of Langley are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
